Author: StarRider88
Message: Hello.

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome StarRider88

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you can see this, please say Yes

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Perfect. In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: StarRider88
Message: That sounds good. Are you the guy who sent me the link?

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post at a time.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yes I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: StarRider88
Message: Hi, Andrew. How are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! How about you?

Author: StarRider88
Message: I'm doing great. I just got done playing Guitar Hero on the Wii.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh nice! I haven't played that in a very long while.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Oh really? I was playing Legends of Rock. Which song is your favorite on there?

Author: Andrew
Message: I honestly don't remember any of them. I just remember that it was really hard.

Author: StarRider88
Message: It's only hard if you choose to play on Hard.

Author: Andrew
Message: I found it hard to do even on normal. But I never played it long enough to really learn the buttons.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Ah. Do you have a job?

Author: Andrew
Message: Kind of. I'm a student, but I work at a KFC to pay for tuition.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Haha KFC. I'm also a student. What college to you go to if you don't mind me asking?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study Biology at the University of Western, Ontario.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Oh nice. I don't really have a major yet. I go to Santa Rosa Junior College in California.

Author: Andrew
Message: What would you like to study?

Author: StarRider88
Message: I'd probably like to study astrophysics and veterinary sciences. Only problem is that both involve lots of math. Also considering geology.

Author: Andrew
Message: That sounds really awesome actually. I study biology and neurosciences.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Biology? Nice. When I was little I wanted to be a biologist.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds like you want to do everything.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Haha yeah. I'm a huge science guy. My favorite subject is astronomy. I just love the universe and I want to know more about it. If only it didn't require so much math.

Author: Andrew
Message: Many things in sciences require maths anyway, but it's true that astronomy might require more than others. I'm not really an expert on the topic.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yeah. By the way, can I ask you a question?

Author: Andrew
Message: Of course!

Author: StarRider88
Message: Which letter of the English alphabet flies, sings, and stings?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: StarRider88
Message: The human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin, then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: StarRider88
Message: Hi, Andrew. How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm alright thanks. You?

Author: StarRider88
Message: I'm doing great. Time expired in the last conversation before the actor could answer my question.

Author: Andrew
Message: What was the question?

Author: StarRider88
Message: Which letter of the English alphabet flies, sings, and stings?

Author: Andrew
Message: B.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Wow. You're really good. I didn't think you could answer trick questions.

Author: Andrew
Message: Why not?

Author: StarRider88
Message: I don't know. Thought maybe a trick question could trip the AI up.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I'm not the AI so...

Author: StarRider88
Message: I'm going to take that with a grain of salt because for all I know, you're lying to me. Why would the actor give me the answer to the experiment?

Author: Andrew
Message: Maybe to make it easier for you.

Author: StarRider88
Message: I doubt it. That would ruin the experiment. Let's try this question. Which one is correct? “Penguins flies” or “A Penguin flies”

Author: Andrew
Message: The second one.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Wrong. Neither is correct. Penguins don't fly.

Author: Andrew
Message: That's a good point. It was grammatically correct though.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Yes that's true. But that wasn't the answer to the trick question.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yup. Doesn't mean I'm an AI though.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Of course it doesn't. But here is another question. If God is all powerful and can do anything, can he create a boulder so heavy, that even he can't lift it?

Author: Andrew
Message: There is no valid answer to this.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Correct, because the question is a paradox. Anyway, enough with the trick questions. Let's learn about you. Do you have a job or go to school?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. I'm a student and work at a KFC.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Cool. What kind of video games do you play, if you play any?

Author: Andrew
Message: ROGs and City Builders in general.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Cool. I've never played either. So, do you remember anything we talked about in the previous conversation?

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you mean?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: StarRider88
Message: The AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: I only accept integer values. 4 or 5?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise, you can close this window.

Author: StarRider88
Message: I really enjoyed this experiment. The Andrew in the second conversation said that he wasn't the AI after I mentioned I thought an AI would trip up over a trick question. Now THAT tripped me up. Haha.

Author: StarRider88
Message: Overall, very enjoyable.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you. You can now close this window.
